text: The 2025 Asian Winter Games (), also called the Asian Winter Games or Harbin 2025 (), was the 9th Asian Winter Games. This was a multi-sport event from 7 February to 14 February 2025. The games were in Harbin, Heilongjiang, China. This was the second time that Harbin hosted the event. This was the 3rd time that China hosted the Asian Winter Games. == Notes == == References == ==Other websites== *Official website Category:2025 in sports Category:2020s in China Category:Harbin Category:Multi-sport events Category:Sports competitions
title: 2025 Asian Winter Games
